ResearchProjectDef.label: abysstech engineering
ResearchProjectDef.description: Delve into the technology of the Lighthouse to acquire hints of replicating their gears.

ResearchProjectDef.label: charged bolt
ResearchProjectDef.description: Craft moyo charge weaponaries. Opting for a bolt casting system to reduce loss of energy, it only requires some modifications to pulse charged weapon technology, and doesn’t take much to research.

ResearchProjectDef.label: weaponized cryonics
ResearchProjectDef.description: Craft cryogenic weaponaries. A result of the lighthouse’s research into minimizing bloodloss in combat.

ResearchProjectDef.label: deepsea diving suit
ResearchProjectDef.description: Craft moyo diving suits. Used as a substitute for armor in the civil war, it went through many modifications to be adapted for surface use, including removal of the tail piece.

ResearchProjectDef.label: deepblue extraction
ResearchProjectDef.description: Research how to synthesize new drugs with deepblue.

ResearchProjectDef.label: medicinal deepblue
ResearchProjectDef.description: Research how to use deepblue for medical purposes.

ResearchProjectDef.label: deepblue manipulation
ResearchProjectDef.description: With extreme understanding of biological and mechanical engineering, now you can manipulate deepblue to craft items with immense capabilities.

ResearchProjectDef.label: deepblue synthesis
ResearchProjectDef.description: Research into a more sustainable means of deepblue production. Deepblue itself cannot be synthesized, but there are other means of obtaining it.
